description: Schema for `cloud_properties` section used by Resource Pools and VM Types.

advertised_routes.description: Creates routes in an [AWS Route Table](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonVPC/latest/UserGuide/VPC_Route_Tables.html) with the created BOSH VM as the target. Requires IAM action `ec2:CreateRoute`, `ec2:DescribeRouteTables`, `ec2:ReplaceRoute`.

table_id.description: ID of the route table in which to create the route

destination.description: Destination CIDR for the route. All traffic with a destination within this CIDR will be routed through the created BOSH VM.

auto_assign_public_ip.description: Assigns a public IP address to the created VM. This IP is ephemeral and may change; use an [Elastic IP](http://bosh.io/docs/networks/#vip) instead for a persistent address.

elbs.description: Array of ELB names that should be attached to created VMs.
elbs.title: Elastic Load Balancers

ephemeral_disk.description: EBS backed ephemeral disk of custom size.

encrypted.description: Enables encryption for the EBS backed ephemeral disk.
encrypted.title: Ephemeral Disk

iops.description: Specifies the number of I/O operations per second to provision for the drive.
iops.title: IOPS

kms_key_arn.description: The ARN of an Amazon KMS key to use when encrypting the disk.
kms_key_arn.title: KMS Key ARN

size.description: Specifies the disk size in megabytes.
size.title: Size

use_instance_storage.description: Forces the usage of instance storage as ephemeral disk backing.
use_instance_storage.title: Use Instance Storage

ephemeral_disk.title: Ephemeral Disk

key_name.description: Key pair name. Defaults to key pair name specified by `default_key_name` in global CPI settings.
key_name.title: Key Name

lb_target_groups.description: Array of Load Balancer Target Groups to which created VMs should be attached.
lb_target_groups.title: Load Balancer Target Groups

raw_instance_storage.description: Exposes all available [instance storage via labeled disks](http://bosh.io/docs/aws-instance-storage/).
raw_instance_storage.title: Raw Instance Storage

root_disk.description: EBS backed root disk of custom size.

size.description: Specifies the disk size in megabytes.
size.title: Size

root_disk.title: Root Disk

source_dest_check.description: Specifies whether the instance must be the source or destination of any traffic it sends or receives. If set to `false`, the instance does not need to be the source or destination. Used for network address translation (NAT) boxes, frequently to communicate between VPCs. Requires IAM action `ec2:ModifyInstanceAttribute`.

spot_bid_price.description: Bid price in dollars for AWS spot instance. Using this option will slow down VM creation.
spot_bid_price.title: Spot Bid Price

spot_ondemand_fallback.description: Set to true to use an on demand instance if a spot instance is not available during VM creation.
spot_ondemand_fallback.title: Spot On-Demand Fallback

title: Virtual Machine
